typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		Parent_Processor_Group as string,
		Running as string,
		Stopped as string,
		Disabled as string,
		Invalid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(Parent_Processor_Group == 'Appdataingest') ~> Filter1
Filter1 split(Stopped > '0',
	Disabled > '0',
	Invalid > '0',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(stopped processors, Disabled Processors, invalid processors, Disabled )
